node.title: World Federation Neurological Scale
node.explanation:
The World Federation Neurological Scale (WFNS) incorporates both the GCS score and features of the neurological exam.
  • Grade 1: GCS 15
  • Grade 2: GCS 13-15 without neurological deficit
  • Grade 3: GCS 13-15 with neurological deficit
  • Grade 4: GCS 7-12
  • Grade 5: GCS 3-6
    • Although this score correlates better with clinical outcomes, most people still use the Hunt-Hess Scale.
